output.sentences: It was the day for our Chemistry class to meet in the lab.
Today's experiment involved making a normal solution.
William sat there resting his chin on his hand doubting if he would ever get into medical school because he did not understand anything.y
We all encouraged him and developed our methods, procedures and work assignments for the group at our bench.
Our solution was perfect and in fact everyone in the class was successful in completing the experiment.
